page.title: 07Terraced House & Flat:Kirkby
page.content: My name is Keith and I live in a terraced house. We have 3 bedrooms but we do not have a garage. There are no post boxes or telephones in our street and outside our house there is a big field immediately in front. Further away are more terraced houses and also at the back. Inside our house we have a gas fire and a gas cooker. The house was built in 1967 and is now 18 years old. My mum and dad moved to it because work was near. My name is Claire and I live in a low rise flat. The building has 3 floors. I live in the middle one. Our flat has 3 bedrooms but the bottom floor flats have only 2. I like living in a flat but I hate walking up the stairs all the time.
